name: Sanctus Mortem
description: Drawing inspiration from acclaimed classics Xenosaga and Xenogears, comes a saga set amidst the backdrop of galactic warfare, political intrigue, and secrets that will unravel the very fabric of existence itself!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
